Class StyledDocumentConverter

java.lang.Object
com.dua3.utility.text.AttributeBasedConverter<StyledDocument>
com.dua3.utility.swing.StyledDocumentConverter
All Implemented Interfaces:
RichTextConverter<StyledDocument>
public final class StyledDocumentConverter extends AttributeBasedConverter<StyledDocument>
A AttributeBasedConverter implementation for translating RichText to StyledDocument.
